paper_abstract: Construction of energy-saving schedules for the execution of n jobs on a processor with the use of the dynamic voltage scaling (DVS) mechanism is considered. A formal problem statement is presented. The problem is shown to be NP-hard. An algorithm with complexity O(n (2)/epsilon) guaranteeing finding of a (1 + epsilon)-approximate solution is suggested.
paper_title: On one problem of construction of energy-saving schedules
